keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for local NHS services, including saving the 'DGH' and opposing health service cuts.

issues.education: Protecting school budgets and opposing academies.
issues.health: Campaign to save local health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Believes an MP's job is being deeply involved in the community and putting local people first.

politicalExperience.achievements: Achievements include fighting for local NHS services and working on individual cases of thousands of local constituents.

images.caption: Stephen Lloyd with supporters during the 'Save the DGH' campaign.
Stephen Lloyd interacting with local constituents and community leaders.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contains various photographs of Stephen Lloyd engaging with the community and a personal endorsement from Floella Benjamin OBE.
